name: Damaged (Benjouille)
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 submission, theme REPAIR. 

Go to an adventure to repair your lost faculties, in a dreamlike strange universe.

Diversifiers: 
The Roaring 20s

Credits: 

Game Developper Benjamin Morelle
Game Developper Jérémy Ha
Game Designer / Level Designer Tom Caldray
Game Designer / Level Designer Théo Kacedali
Game Artist Aymeric Franel
Technical Artist Alexandre Battini
